__TOC__

Greetings. My name is Pavel Nazarov and I'm from Moscow, Russia. I interested in computer science, programming and lot of others high-tech things. Particularly i very interested in FOSS, Linux and Unix. My aim is to spread the word of Free Software solutions and taking a part in community.
Today I use Ubuntu for many of my computers.

=== Activity ===
I:
* taking a part in <nowiki>[[http://ubuntu.ru|Russian Ubuntu LOCO Team]]</nowiki>
* write open source code
* translate software in my native language - Russian
* send bug reports and contribute patches to various OSS projects
* work everyday with Unix technologies
